Module net.automatalib.api
Package net.automatalib.automaton

Interface MutableDeterministic.FullIntAbstraction<T,​SP,​TP>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - transition type
    SP - state property type
    TP - transition property type
    All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    Enclosing interface:
    MutableDeterministic<S,​I,​T,​SP,​TP>
    public static interface MutableDeterministic.FullIntAbstraction<T,​SP,​TP>
extends MutableDeterministic.IntAbstraction<T,​SP,​TP>, UniversalDeterministicAutomaton.FullIntAbstraction<T,​SP,​TP>
    Interface for full integer abstractions of a MutableDeterministic.
